message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to let it go for $90.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $90 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $85 for the product.  What do you think?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand that $85 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $87.50. I think this is a fair price that works for both of us.
